entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Tisdale
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:15 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melfort 6:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -12.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -14.9°C
Wind: E 19 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
